abstract: Rafik Saïfi (Arabic: رفيق صايفي‎; born February 7, 1975 in Algiers) is an Algerian professional football player who is currently playing for Amiens SC in the Championnat National.
comment: Rafik Saïfi (Arabic: رفيق صايفي‎; born February 7, 1975 in Algiers) is an Algerian professional football player who is currently playing for Amiens SC in the Championnat National.
